## Description and Rationale

I developed a strong passion for aviation last year, and I’m eager to apply the data science skills I’ve gained through my education and professional experience to try to make a meaningful contribution to the aviation industry.

## Details

* Type: Independent
* Country: Japan

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(gt)

gt(tibble::tribble(
  ~id, ~forename, ~surname,  ~affiliation,
   1L,   "Augey", "Yohann", "Independent"
  )
) |>   cols_label(id = md("**ID**"), forename = md("**Forename**"), surname ~ md("**Surname**"), affiliation ~ md("**Affiliation**"))
```
